[Markdown formatting]
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** Senior Procurement Support Services
**Reference Number:** cb-8349-42513795
**Publication Date:** August 22, 2023
**Closing Date:** November 23, 2023 at 14:00:00

## Request for Proposal

Elections Canada is seeking Senior Procurement Specialists to provide day-to-day procurement support services and expertise related to procurement and contracting on an as-and-when- requested basis.

**Background:** Elections Canada is responsible for conducting federal elections and referendums in Canada. As a result, the Chief Electoral Officer exercises general direction and supervision over the conduct of these processes. Elections Canada operates independently, leveraging existing Government of Canada procurement tools and vehicles where possible, while maintaining a commitment to respecting the spirit and intent of applicable government processes.

**Requirement:** Elections Canada requires Senior Procurement Specialists to provide day-to-day procurement support services and expertise related to procurement and contracting. The work is currently being performed by Lumina IT (now Cofomo Inc.).

**Security Requirements:**

Minimum corporate security required: DOS - Reliability
Minimum resource security required: Reliability status

**Contract Period:** The contract period will be for two (2) years from the Effective Date of the Contract, with the option to extend for an additional two 12-month periods.

**Submission of Proposals:** Proposals must be addressed to the attention of the Contracting Authority and delivered, sealed, to the Proposal Receiving Unit on or before the closing date and time. Proposals may be submitted electronically via the epost Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation.

**Enquiries:** All enquiries and communications with Elections Canada personnel must be directed to the Contracting Authority in writing at proposal@elections.ca. Enquiries received after the deadline may not be answered.

**Trade Agreements:** This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

## Important Dates

* Publication Date: August 22,
